name: ASA: A Space Adventure
description:
ASA: A Space Adventure (Remastered Edition) is the remake / improved HD version of ASA, a game originally released in January 2013. ASA is a 1st-person "point and click" adventure game reminiscent of Riven, and that can remind of 2001: A Space Odyssey. Visit the Ark spaceship and try to access the various environments and planets, with one single thing in mind : going back home!

ASA comes back in a HD remake thanks to the help of developer Andrea Rinaldi. If you're fond of the Myst or Rhem series, it's more likely that you will enjoy this space journey ! ASA will keep you busy for about 10 hours, if not more.

"With a captivating backstory and engaging, challenging puzzles, ASA: A Space Adventure is a welcome addition to the pantheon of Myst-style puzzle-adventure games!" (4/5, AdventureGamers.com)

ASA is part of the Black Cube series which includes such games such as Myha and Catyph, other Sci-Fi adventures. You can learn more on www.theblackcube.fr.
If you like ASA, you might be interested in its sequel Catyph? We recommend playing the Remastered Edition.
Original Edition is also included at the bottom of this page if you prefer.
English, French, Italian, German, Spanish.

If you buy the game here on itch.io, you'll have the possibility to request a free Steam key (please note that there is a limited quantity of keys: I'd have to update the list manually if all the keys were requested, which can take a few hours or days. When there are no remaining keys, you will be able to try again later, when I have added new ones). ASA Remastered is also available for purchase on Steam and Humble Store.

This game contains puzzles that can be difficult, and requires a pen and a paper to take notes. A walkthrough is available here.

Homepage: http://www.theblackcube.fr/asa
Original release: January 7th, 2013
For more info about this project, follow The Icehouse collective on Tumblr or Facebook! http://www.theicehouse.fr
